cleaned_text: Essential Oils for Spirituality Aromatic herbs and oils, including essential oils, have been an integral part of the spiritual practices of many religions and cultures throughout history. Below are a list of some of the essential oils associated with particular spiritual applications. This is not intended to be a complete list. For instance, once in awhile, I feel called to use [Manuka](/essential-oils/manuka-essential-oil.php) while meditating yet it isn't an oil generally known for its spiritual applications. If a particular essential oil personally speaks out to you, consider incorporating it within your own spiritual practices after you have learned about the oil and understand any warnings or contraindications associated with the oil. Biblical Essential Oils Refer to the [Aromatic Botanicals of Biblical Days](aromatic-plants-oils-included-in-bible-reference-guide.php) article for a list of the aromatic botanicals mentioned in the Bible.
